title: Time Masters
screenings: Vue Screen 11, Fri 8 Nov 13:45 & Sun 10 Nov 21:00 & Fri 15 Nov 18:00
info: UK Premiere of 4K Restoration | René Laloux | France, Switzerland, West Germany, UK, Hungary | 1982 | 78 minutes | French | BBFC Rating PG
description: Directed by visionary animator René Laloux and designed by the legendary Jean Giraud (a.k.a. Moebius), Time Masters is a visually fantastic foray into existentialist space adventure, presented in its new 4K restoration. After his parents are killed on the dangerous planet Perdide, young Piel survives by maintaining radio contact with Jaffar, a pilot transporting the exiled Prince Matton and Princess Belle. Along the way, they encounter the Time Masters, mysterious beings who can bend reality and reveal to the heroes their secret origins and destinies.
